comment._content: Is that a gold disk? en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frankie_Laine says that he got four in 1947.

comment._content: I think the other guy is Carl Fischer. See www.jazzbiographies.com/Biography.aspx?ID=234 "Carl T. Fischer was born to an American Indian mother and a father who was half German and half Indian."
